summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of the south 60 feet of Lot 7, Block 16, Highland Park Addition; Lot 25, Block 3, Davis Addition; and Lots 3, 4 and 5, Block 15, Porterfield's Addition; with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-247 and 17-195, respectively.
